name: @brendancopley/mcp-chain-of-draft-prompt-tool
display_name: MCP Chain of Draft (CoD) Prompt Tool
description: MCP Chain of Draft (CoD) Prompt Tool is a BYOLLM MCP (Model Context Protocol) tool that transforms your prompt using another LLM, applying CoD or CoT reasoning techniques, before delivering the final result. CoD is a novel paradigm that allows LLMs to generate minimalistic yet informative intermediate reasoning outputs while solving tasks, significantly reducing token usage while maintaining accuracy. For fast setup -> scroll ↓  click "Connect"! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- DO NOT be daunted by all the configurations—you can simply scroll down and hit “Connect” to get started effortlessly.
